parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The unavailability of Takata airbag recall parts can lead to a delay in the repair of the vehicle, potentially putting the driver and passengers at risk of injury or death in the event of an accident.
symptoms: The vehicle owner receives a recall notification
but the parts needed to repair the vehicle are not available
resulting in a delay in the repair process.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Lack of Communication and Transparency from Audi
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The lack of communication and transparency from Audi can lead to frustration and anxiety for vehicle owners, as they are left unsure of when the repair will be completed and what steps they need to take to ensure their safety.
symptoms: Vehicle owners report receiving inadequate or unclear information from Audi regarding the status of the recall repair

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The delay in the repair of the vehicle can cause inconvenience and safety concerns for vehicle owners, who may be forced to drive an unsafe vehicle or make alternative arrangements for transportation.
symptoms: Vehicle owners report feeling unsafe driving their vehicle
being unable to use their vehicle
or experiencing inconvenience due to the delay in the repair process.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the DSG transmission can cause hesitation, jerking, or loss of power while shifting gears, leading to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: Hesitation or delay in shifting gears
vehicle stalls or refuses to move.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the mechatronic unit can cause the transmission to malfunction, leading to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: hesitation or delay in shifting gears
vehicle stalls or refuses to move.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the cam timing chain can cause engine damage, leading to costly repairs and potentially causing accidents.
The failure of the ABS system can cause the vehicle to stall or become difficult to control, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: the vehicle is unable to start
the vehicle experiences unusual braking behavior.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ignition system can cause the vehicle to stall or become difficult to start, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: the vehicle is difficult to start
the vehicle experiences unusual starting behavior.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Lack of Disclosure of Recall Issues
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the dealership or manufacturer to disclose recall issues can lead to a lack of awareness on the part of the vehicle owner, potentially causing safety risks or unexpected repair costs.
symptoms: The vehicle owner is unaware of existing recall issues
the vehicle owner is not informed of necessary repairs
the vehicle owner experiences unexpected problems or failures.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the dealership or manufacturer to provide adequate customer service and support can lead to frustration, financial burden, and safety risks for the vehicle owner.
symptoms: The vehicle owner is unable to get help or support from the dealership or manufacturer
the vehicle owner is ignored or dismissed
the vehicle owner is left to bear the cost of repairs or towing.
